function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of awareness about specific roles and responsibilities","Impact":"Misunderstandings, lack of collaboration, and inefficiency","Mitigation":"Clear communication of roles and responsibilities, regular team-building activities","Technologies":"Internal communication platforms, collaboration tools","People":"Employees, team members","Owner":"Team leaders, HR department"},{"Description":"Inadequate time management and organization","Impact":"Missed deadlines, disorganization, and decreased productivity","Mitigation":"Time management training, task prioritization, and use of organizational tools","Technologies":"Time tracking software, task management apps","People":"Employees, project managers","Owner":"HR department, project management team"},{"Description":"Limited knowledge sharing and interaction between colleagues","Impact":"Lack of collaboration, stagnation, and reduced innovation","Mitigation":"Encourage knowledge sharing, cross-departmental activities, and mentorship programs","Technologies":"Knowledge sharing platforms, virtual collaboration tools","People":"Employees, managers, team leaders","Owner":"HR department, team leaders"}]}
